hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
PASS_KEY="/FD/FD_DB_PASSWORD" USER_KEY="/FD/FD_DB_USERNAME" PATH_KEY="/FD/FD_DB_PATH" # v3 vs v2 compat. eval '$SSHCMD systemctl cat bootstrap|grep v3' if [ "$?"=="0" ]; then PASS_KEY="/environment/RDSPASSWORD" USER_KEY="/flight-director/config/db-username" PATH_KEY="/flight-director/config/db-path" fi
# in URL:PORT format DB_URL=$(eval '$SSHCMD etcdctl get $PATH_KEY') DB_USER=$(eval '$SSHCMD etcdctl get $USER_KEY') DB_PASS=$(eval '$SSHCMD etcdctl get $PASS_KEY') DB_HOST=${DB_URL%%:*} DB_PORT=${DB_URL##*:}
eval $SSHCMD rm -rf /home/core/dumps eval $SSHCMD mkdir /home/core/dumps
# DUMP SRC eval $SSHCMD \ "' docker run --rm \ -v /home/core/dumps:/root/dumps/ mysql:latest \ sh -c \"exec mysqldump -h$DB_HOST -P$DB_PORT -u$DB_USER -p"$DB_PASS" $SOURCE_DB > /root/dumps/dump.sql\" '"
# CREATE DEST eval $SSHCMD \ "' docker run --rm mysql:latest \ sh -c \"exec mysqladmin -h$DB_HOST -P$DB_PORT -u$DB_USER -p"$DB_PASS" create $DEST_DB\" '"
# RESTORE SRC DUMP INTO DEST eval $SSHCMD \ "' docker run --rm \ -v /home/core/dumps:/root/dumps/ mysql:latest \ sh -c \"exec mysql -h$DB_HOST -P$DB_PORT -u$DB_USER -p"$DB_PASS" $DEST_DB < /root/dumps/dump.sql\" '"
# DROP SRC #eval $SSHCMD \ # "' docker run --rm mysql:latest \ # sh -c \"exec mysqladmin -h$DB_HOST -P$DB_PORT -u$DB_USER -p"$DB_PASS" drop $SOURCE_DB\" '"
eval $SSHCMD rm -rf /home/core/dumps
